publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5908.3 Liam McArthur: Aquacultureâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5908) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, after "particular" insert "; calls on the Scottish Government to clarify what action it is taking to develop and retain a skilled and qualified workforce in the sector; supports industry calls for greater clarity about the food consumers buy through country of origin labelling, and invites ministers to make clear their intentions regarding any moves to amend protected geographical status for Scottish farmed salmon;"
